posts.title: Python 字典小练习
posts.text: 题目：已知存贮学生数据序列如下： 123456789students = [ {'name': 'Alice', 'class': 'A', 'score': 85}, {'name': 'Bob', 'class': 'B', 'score': 70}, {'name': 'Charlie', 'class': 'A', 'score': 90}, {'name': 'David', 'class': 'B', 'score': 65}, {'name': 'Eve', 'class': 'A', 'score': 95}, {'name': 'Frank', 'class': 'C', 'score': 75}, {'name': 'Grace', 'class': 'C', 'score': 80},] 请编写一个程序可以统计以班级为单位的学生数，最高分，最低分和平均分。生成字典如下： 1234567891011121314151617181920{ 'A': { 'count': 3, 'average_score': 90.0, 'highest_score': 95, 'lowest_score': 85 }, 'B': { 'count': 2, 'average_score': 67.5, 'highest_score': 70, 'lowest_score': 65 }, 'C': { 'count': 2, 'average_score': 77.5, 'highest_score': 80, 'lowest_score': 75 }} 代码 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950515253545556students = [ {'name': 'Alice', 'class': 'A', 'score': 85}, {'name': 'Bob', 'class': 'B', 'score': 70}, {'name': 'Charlie', 'class': 'A', 'score': 90}, {'name': 'David', 'class': 'B', 'score': 65}, {'name': 'Eve', 'class': 'A', 'score': 95}, {'name': 'Frank', 'class': 'C', 'score': 75}, {'name': 'Grace', 'class': 'C', 'score': 80},]# list1~3用来A,B,C不同班级的分类list_all = [list(), list(), list()]# 将students中不同班级区分开来for i in students: if i["class"] == "A": list_all[0].append(i) elif i["class"] == "B": list_all[1].append(i) else: list_all[2].append(i)# 用来最终存放输出目标的字典dirct1 = {"A": 1, "B": 2, "C": 3}# a用来判断目前统计的班级a = 1# 现在遍历的是哪个班级for j in list_all: # 记录最高分数 highest_score = 0 # 记录最低分数 lowest_score = 100 # 记录总分，以便求平均分 all_score = 0 # 统计班级学生人数 num = 0 # 用来统计item班级 for item in j: num += 1 if item["score"] >= highest_score: highest_score = item["score"] if item["score"] <= lowest_score: lowest_score = item["score"] all_score += item["score"] # 将统计的数据放入dirct2字典 dirct2 = {"count": num, "average_score": all_score/num, "highest_score": highest_score, "lowest_score": lowest_score} # 将统计完的字典放进总字典里 if a == 1: dirct1["A"] = dirct2 a += 1 elif a == 2: dirct1["B"] = dirct2 a += 1 else: dirct1["C"] = dirct2# 打印出结果print(dirct1)
posts.author: zhoupeng

posts.title: 文件上传
posts.excerpt: 客户端检查—文件后缀检查Burpsuite抓包改包：上传规定的后缀版本，利用Brupsuite抓包修改后缀
posts.text: 客户端检查—文件后缀检查Burpsuite抓包改包：上传规定的后缀版本，利用Brupsuite抓包修改后缀 禁用JS脚本（删除）使用开发者工具，找到onsubmit删除。但是一般无法实现，因为浏览器已经加载JS MIME类型检查—文件类型检查Burpsuite抓包修改content-tyoe黑名单检查Burpsuite使用以下后缀名进行模糊测试上传php3、php4、php5、php7、pht、phtml白名单检查存在文件包含include、include_once、require、require_onceMagic Header检查修改文件头信息在PHP文件开始部分添加GIF89a GIF89a–>47494638 竞争上传1<?php fputs(fopen("shell.php","w"),'<?php eval($_POST["data"]); ?>') ?>
posts.author: zhoupeng

posts.title: Hello World
posts.excerpt: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
